id: id of the destination to locate in the assets folder
title: name of the destination shown in the website
legend: description of the destination shown in the website

community.id: id of the community to locate in the assets folder
community.legend: description of the community shown in the website

leaders.id: id of the picture at the assets folder
leaders.name: name to show in the website
leaders.role: rol of the leader in the community, shown in the website

places.id: id of the place to locate in the folder
places.title: name of the section shown in the website

places.id: id of the place to locate image in assets
places.title: title of the place shown in the site
places.url: url to something of the place

activities.id: id of the activity to locate in assets folder
activities.title: title of the section shown in the site

places.id: id of the activity to locate image in ./assets/activites/[activity-id]/[place-id]
places.title: title of the place shown in the site
places.url: url to something of the place, social media, site, article, etc.
